advance_payee_check.name: advance_payee_check
advance_payee_check.value:
(
    (user_id IS NOT NULL AND staff_member_id IS NULL) OR
    (user_id IS NULL AND staff_member_id IS NOT NULL)
  )

salary_payee_check.name: salary_payee_check
salary_payee_check.value:
(
    (user_id IS NOT NULL AND staff_member_id IS NULL) OR
    (user_id IS NULL AND staff_member_id IS NOT NULL)
  )
